# List of prime ministers of the Kingdom of Sardinia__disambig_1

This is a list of the prime ministers of the Kingdom of Sardina () from the granting of the Statuto Albertino in 1848 until the proclamation of the Kingdom of Italy in 1861. The Kingdom of Sardinia, which was based in Piedmont, is also known as Piedmont-Sardinia.
Heads of government of the Kingdom of Sardina (1730–1848)
Grand Chancellor:
*1730–1740: Giovanni Cristoforo Zoppi
*1742–1745: Carlo Vincenzo Ferrero d'Ormea
First Secretary of State:
*1756–1763: Giuseppe Osorio Alarcòn
Grand Chancellor:
*1768–1779: Carlo Luigi Caissotti
*1789–1793: Giuseppe Ignazio Corte
Presidents of the Council of Ministers (1848–1861)
